long_description: The Sony Action Cam adhesive mounts secure your Action Cam (sold separately) in its waterproof housing to curved or flat surfaces so you can capture all the high-flying, fast-moving action. Perfect for any smooth surface from helmets to snowboard decks, black curved and flat mounts feature industrial-strength adhesive that helps keep them permanently in place. Yellow baseplate attaches to your Action Cam's waterproof housing (sold separately) with a threaded screw that fits the housing's tripod mounting hole. Leave the baseplate attached to your Action Cam and click it securely into and out of the curved and flat mounts for easy position changes. Sony Action Cam adhesive mounts include 1 flat mount, 1 curved mount and 1 baseplate.
short_description: The Sony Action Cam adhesive mounts secure your Action Cam (sold separately) in its waterproof housing to curved or flat surfaces so you can capture all the high-flying, fast-moving action.
